summary: A collection of integration tests that use Moto to mock AWS services and Boto3 to create, update, and delete CloudFormation stacks, exercising many resource types and template features such as autoscaling, DynamoDB, Lambda, SSM parameters, event rules, KMS, spot fleets, NAT gateways, and intrinsic functions.
business_intent: Verify that CloudFormation stack operations behave correctly across a broad set of AWS resources and template constructs, ensuring reliable support for these features in the application.
